user.title: Victron VRM API
user.description:
**Configuration Note:**
Please ensure that all optional fields are filled in correctly if these devices are to be used. Otherwise, leave the ID set to 0 or the field empty.

Instance ID = 0 or `empty field` means no device will be added!

Multiple devices per Instance ID can be entered separated by commas. Example: 100, 101, 102
